channel.title: Problem with AVG 8.0 uninstall
channel.description: I got a problem with my AVG 8.0, i cannot uninstall the program and it is stoping me from loging into MSN. Anyone experianced this problem or know how to fix it because i am getting really pissed off about it.

item.title: Problem with AVG 8.0 uninstall
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

There’s a little box in the AVG main window, that you click to turn off Internet Shield. Then you can log on to MSN. If you had’ve actually tried what ZeroFreeze said to do before you went off searching aimlessly you would’ve known that.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with AVG 8.0 uninstall
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

[quote=“Mrs Extro Limited, post:1, topic:221229”]I got a problem with my AVG 8.0, i cannot uninstall the program and it is stoping me from loging into MSN.
Anyone experianced this problem or know how to fix it because i am getting really pissed off about it.[/quote] i had the same problem alllong time ago i had to do a full system restore -.- and i only got 7.5 lol

Read full topic

8 hours? where de fuck did you search? on hotmail.coM?

item.title: Problem with AVG 8.0 uninstall
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:8, topic:221229”][quote author=Mrs Extro Limited link=topic=290447.msg2343771#msg2343771 date=1216484868]
After searching for 8 hours I found a program that removes all norton and AVG files. Now my msn works.
[/quote]
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=remove+norton+avg+files&btnG=Google+Search

It took me exactly 4 seconds, gg.

Also, you could’ve read just this:

[quote author=ZeroFreeze link=topic=290447.msg2343117#msg2343117 date=1216450030]
A quick google search would’ve given you the answer.

P.s: wrong section
[/quote][/quote]
Yes I have. I was searching through google I emailed Norton and AVG and they both told me to delete AVG and norton then re-install. I tried to delete but I could not, then I searched for a program for free for around 8 hours and then I found something for free, that worked and then I could sign back into msn. Thanks anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with AVG 8.0 uninstall
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

Thanks for the comment but i tried everything i can think of, every time i try to unistall i get a error message saying “uninstallation FAILED” Im not sure why but im sure is the AVG thats messing with my msn.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with AVG 8.0 uninstall
item.dc:creator: @HAZEL HAZEL
item.description:
@HAZEL wrote:

I’ve never faced a problem like that but if you are trying to uninstall using the windows try it with other program I use CCleaner to uninstall programs and I’ve never had problems doing it. I hope it helps, if not sorry

Read full topic
